name: Square fall (bjorn_nah)
description:
Square fall was a puzzle game for Gameboy inspired by an old Motion Twin flash game.

The project was realized in a rush for gbcompo21 using GBDK, an was currently a work in progress. 

On my todo list :

  • make a proper titlescreen
  • redraw the square tiles
  • compose & add musics
  • upgrade the score system
  • etc.
